{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00352v1", "title": "Hybrid-integrated dark-pulse microcombs towards visible light spectrum", "summary": "Leveraging hybrid integration, we demonstrate dark-pulse formation at 780-nm
wavelength band in integrated Si$_3$N$_4$ microresonators driven by high-power
AlGaAs-based chip-scale lasers. The device outputs coherent frequency combs
with electronically detectable repetition rates down to 20 GHz, paving a route
to efficient and compact atom-chip interfaces for spectroscopy, metrology and
sensing.", "main_category": "physics.optics", "categories": "physics.optics,physics.app-ph,physics.atom-ph", "published": "2025-05-01T06:50:59Z"}
